The space
3 Bed, 3 Bath, Sleeps 7

Located in Boston's Beacon Hill neighborhood near the West End neighborhood, one of the most desirable areas of the city to call home. When you live here, you're within walking distance to Beacon Hill and the North End, full of local restaurants, bars and plenty of history. The historic West End is a very walkable neighborhood, and being so close to all lines of the T certainly doesn't hurt! Whether you're walking to the new indoor farmers market, the neighborhood Whole Foods, or to the T for your daily commute, you won't need to rely on your car - a blessing during wintertime! Come see what the West End has to offer
